name: Baby's First Tantrum
description:
Control a superhuman baby, and scale the tallest building in the world. You will enconter countless perials along the way. Planes will try to shoot you down, and people will discard their trash on your head. However, there are powerups, that can assist you on your quest. From bean's to baby's bottles, make your superhuman experience more super.  All artwork, music, and soundeffects are original. 

Controls: 

Arrow Key's - Climb around with baby.

Enter - Start the game, or retry.

Space - Smash with baby's fist

Make it to the top to discover the origin's of the gigababy and it's powers.
